name: Return to Owner
description:
Returning your overdue book to the library turned into a neighborhood-spanning quest.

Made in Bitsy for the monthly bitsy jam, with the theme: Overdue Library Books.

Known Issues:

  • Start of dialog pages getting indented: This issue started occurred to dialogues that I did some edit to today, It does not occur otherwise. I couldn't fix it for the jam entry upload, but I'll see if I can get a patch for it done in the future (No guarantees, though!)
